sentences.en: A five-course meal including coffee, service and VAT is £30.
sentences.cn: 包括咖啡、服务费及增值税在内，一顿五道菜正餐的价格为30英镑。

sentences.en: Brush your teeth after each meal and floss daily.
sentences.cn: 餐后要刷牙，而且每天要使用牙线清洁牙缝。

sentences.en: Dickie bored him all through the meal with stories of the Navy.
sentences.cn: 迪基吃饭时一直在讲海军的故事，让他不胜其烦。

sentences.en: Dinner is the main meal of the day for most people.
sentences.cn: 晚饭是大多数人一天中的主餐。

sentences.en: Don'tbe afraid to ask for advice about ordering the meal.
sentences.cn: 点餐时可以大胆征求意见。

sentences.en: He had been feeling drowsy, the effect of an unusually heavy meal.
sentences.cn: 他一直感到昏昏沉沉的，这是吃了一顿超级大餐的结果。

sentences.en: Make sure that your meal won't be smothered with white sauce.
sentences.cn: 千万不要把自己的饭菜上都涂满白汁沙司。

sentences.en: Ray and I ate our meal and reminisced about the trip.
sentences.cn: 雷和我吃着饭，回忆起那次旅行。

sentences.en: Saunas can be hazardous if misused. Avoid a big meal beforehand.
sentences.cn: 洗桑拿浴如果方法不当会有危险，浴前切忌饱食。

sentences.en: The Italian way is to round off a meal with an ice-cream.
sentences.cn: 意大利人总是在用餐结束时来份冰激凌。

sentences.en: The meal gave the occasion an almost festive air.
sentences.cn: 这一餐使整个场合有了近乎节日般的喜庆氛围。

sentences.en: The menu is all-important. Every component of every meal should create contrasts.
sentences.cn: 饭菜的安排至关重要。每一顿饭的每一道菜都应该有所不同。

sentences.en: The waiter offered him red wine or white wine with his meal.
sentences.cn: 侍者为他端上佐餐的红葡萄酒或者白葡萄酒。

sentences.en: They haven't had a square meal for four or five days.
sentences.cn: 他们已经四五天没吃上一顿像样的饭了。

sentences.en: We had a nice meal with a bottle of champagne.
sentences.cn: 我们美餐了一顿，还喝了一瓶香槟。

sentences.en: We must have a meal together some time.
sentences.cn: 我们一定要找个时间一起吃顿饭。

sentences.en: You get an interesting meal for a reasonable price.
sentences.cn: 你花不多的钱就可以吃一顿很特别的饭。

phrases.tran_cn: 骨粉（可用作动物饲料或肥料）
n. （美）饭票；餐券；[俚]赖以为生的工作；提供生活来源的人
（为老年人或残疾人的）上门送餐服务

trans.tran_cn: 餐，饭，进餐（时间），〈英〉一次挤奶量，谷物粗粉（用作饲料或加工面粉）
trans.tran_en: an occasion when you eat food, for example breakfast or dinner, or the food that you eat on that occasion
